code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{endpoints}from'../config';import'./Projects.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Projects=()=>{const[projects,setProjects]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch(endpoints.projects).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setProjects(data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching projects:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"section-title",children:"Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"projects-grid",children:projects.map((project,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card project-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"project-name",children:project.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-period",children:project.period}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-tech",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tech-stack-label",children:"Tech Stack:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tech-stack",children:project.techStack})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"project-points",children:project.points.map((point,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:point},i))})]},index))})]});};export default Projects;
